DOC.brief_summary: In equivalence analysis , determine whether IL-6 assess use new densitometric point-of-care ( POC ) assay ( turn-around -time : 20 minute ) .IL-6 measurement compare test result obtain conventional ELISA analysis
DOC.brief_title: IL 6 Measurement Using New Densitometric Bedside ( POC ) Test
DOC.detailed_description: In equivalence analysis , determine whether IL-6 assess use new densitometric point-of-care ( POC ) assay ( turn-around -time : 20 minute ) allow IL-6 measurement bedside . We compare respective test result obtain conventional ELISA analysis
